welcome.title: *Welcome {{name}}!*
welcome.description:
I am the official *Emperie Nails* bot, your assistant to *explore all our training options*.

💡 I can't answer personalized questions, but I can guide you with these commands:

📚 /courses — View all our available courses.
📅 /events — Check out upcoming workshops and training sessions.
❓ /help — Learn how to use this bot.

Type one of the commands to get started. We're here to help you grow as a professional!
